name: Northern Mockingbird
description: A Medium-sized slender songbird with a long tail

name: Northern Cardinal
description: Fairly Large, Long-Tailed Songbird with a short, very thick bill and a prominent crest

name: Carolina Wren
description: small but chunky bird with a round body and a long tail that it often cocks upward.

name: Canadian Goose
description: identified by its black head and neck, white chinstrap, and brown body.
